short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes statistics and other annoying UI elements from Twitch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitch Statistics Remover does just what it says -- removes a variety of statistics from Twitch!

Statistics currently include:
- Viewership numbers
- Follower counts
- Channel leaderboards
- Channel goals

Each option can be enabled or disabled to your liking!

*Please note that the extension does not currently function in the creator dashboard

In the future, I'd like to add the ability to:
- Disable hypetrains
- Remove stream uptime counters
- Disable / modify chat notifications (resubs, raids, etc)
- Add creator dashboard support!

If you find a bug or would like to recommend a feature / enhancement, please visit the extension's GitHub linked in the sidebar :)
